title: The billionaire of Africa will give $1 million to anyone who wants to leave America if Donald Trump is elected president.
subtitle: According to false news sites, Femi Adenajami offered a large amount of money to African Americans who wanted to leave the United States because of Donald Trump's election.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A billionaire from South Africa provides a large amount of money to African Americans who leave the country because of the Trump elections.
